recipesJson.name: 10-Loop
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is my recipe tackling Fruit Loops in Milk. Took quite some time to develop, but here is the latest and most refined recipe. 

Notes: https://diyordie.link/10loop-atf

reviews.text: this taste like VapeTasia‘s. Rainbow Road which is basically Froot Loops milk without the cereal this one taste like Froot Loops milk with the cereal I love it. I definitely think you should release it as a one shot it would definitely sell
Just mixed this up and wow off the shake it's really good. I'm definitely going to let it sit for a couple of days though. Awesome recipe!

I fuckin love this after a few days it all comes together soooo good wayne you done did it again. I get the banana in the back i get the citrus and the cream and the cereal notes. I love when a recipe like this is soooo good.

Please excuse me but I first needed to check if this was an April fools mix. Going by smell all the ingredients seemed to have a place of sorts as I mixed it. It was rough after the shake and at 24 hours the brown sugar notes were still too dark and deep for me clashing with the lemon notes. I did read your flavor notes before mixing it. I also do not get along with Frosted Donut although I could not taste the playdoh. It has steeped for 3 days and I will retest it in another week or so. I enjoyed reading your write up. I would have thought you could have approached this with many of the more suitable flavor concentrates at your disposal e.g. why not try a concentrate intended more for a sugar frosting than use frosted donut to emulate the frosting and the banana nut bread although a nice flavor did not seem to fit in here to me. You mention it being used as bakery I don't know if this profile is a bakery but I think I know what you mean. TFA Fruit Circles is not the least offensive of the cereals.  I would say CAP Silverline Fruit Circles is but that depends on if you have ever tried and also it’s suitability given it's weaker strength would not allow it to stand up to the other stronger flavors. This is a flavorful mix but the brown sugar notes are quite overpowering and dark for my personal tastes and it seems muddled and slightly confused overall at this early stage. I will need to let this sit for another 10 days before I try it again. Cereals with texture and milk are difficult to emulate in vape form. Thanks for all you do, this is a fun profile. I will try and be someone who comes back and revises their feedback at a later stage.
